attributes.action: change government policy on university fees, and treat young asylum seekers as home students instead of as international students, so that they can access university.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, asylum seekers have no right to work, have no access to loans or grants, yet are charged international student fees. Therefore they do not have equal opportunity to complete their education after college.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "change government policy on university fees, and treat young asylum seekers as home students instead of as international students, so that they can access university."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16562
